show_name: Snow White with the Red Hair (TV 2)
plot: This is the continuation of the story about Shirayuki, a young independent and persistent girl with rare red hair who is under training as the palace herbalist, Zen Wistalia, second prince of the kingdom of Clarines, and the journey and struggles that they all go through in dealing with their new found love for each other and the unwanted attention that Shirayuki brings due to her hair.
opening_theme: "Sono Koe ga Chizu ni Naru" (その声が地図になる;Your Voice Becomes a Map) by Saori Hayami
ending_theme: "Page~Kimi to Tsuzuru Monogatari" (ページ～君と綴る物語～;Page~The Story I Weave with You) by eyelis
"Yasashii Kibō" (やさしい希望;Gentle Hope) by Saori Hayami (ep 12)
